imdb.plot outline: Rakesh is Vishakha's ex-boyfriend. He wants to reconcile with Vishakha. However, Vishakha does not want to get back to him. Gopal, a taxi driver, who drops Vishakha to her office daily, is fascinated with Vishakha. Vishakha's parents learn that she is missing and complain to the police. The police enquire Vishakha's colleague, Varun, Gopal and Rakesh. Gopal had kidnapped Vishakha to marry her. However, Vishakha manages to escape from Gopal's captivity. The police arrest Gopal and he confesses his crime.
imdb.title: Vishakha Is Kidnapped: Savdhaan India
plot: Rakesh is Vishakha's ex-boyfriend. He wants to reconcile with Vishakha. However, Vishakha does not want to get back to him. The police arrest Gopal and he confesses his crime.::Sandeep
